EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed to attend Pivotal's Lunch and Learn
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the Lunch and Learn with Ivan Novick. See event details below.
Date: March 10, 2016 Time: 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM Location: Pivotal <[[https://goo.gl/maps/4behkcHmPwA2]]>, 625 Avenue of the Americas, New York, New York 10011
{{my.Save the Date}}
Questions? Please contact us via ndirubio@pivotal.io <[[mailto:ndirubio@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website. <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lunch-and-learn/nyc]]>
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
